attributes.action: Offer annual  PSA tests for prostate cancer detection for men aged  50 and over.
attributes.additional_details: Approximately one in eight men will be diagnosed with prostate cancer. There are very few early symptoms, but if detected early , treatment is usually effective. An early diagnosis and treatment could save men having a prostectomy operation, and save lives.
attributes.background: Similar to bowel cancer testing offered to everyone aged  50 and over

rejection.details:
The following petition calls for a similar action: 

Review and fund improved detection and diagnosis of prostate cancer
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/728751
